job.title: Data Scientist (100% remote)
job.description: <p>***100% REMOTE - available for direct hire (or contract to hire through us here at Eliassen Group)***</p><p><br></p><p>We're looking for a highly skilled Natural Language Processing Data Scientist to support our innovative global client. This is an excellent opportunity to work with world-class analytics consultants to help a wide array of partner organizations!</p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities of the Data Scientist:</p><ul><li>Design, develop, and implement solutions for NLP use cases, leverage problems for AI, NLP, Computer Vision and Speech</li><li>Create, augment, and maintain state-of-the-art scalable NLP solutions in Python (bonus points if you can understand Java/.NET code to collaborate with development team, we aren't needing a full stack developer, but we strive towards the best architectural design possible!)</li><li>Interact with internal/external stakeholders to perform solution feasibility, design, and development/rollout</li></ul><p>Requirements of the Data Scientist:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree and at least 3 years of Data Science/Natural Language Processing (NLP) experiences with data exploration, preprocessing, and tuning NLP/Deep learning</li><li>AI/Machine Learning experience (Deep Learning, working with various sources like MongoDB, domain specific ontologies, external databases)</li><li>Work with our other Data Scientists to aid in enterprise-level/external analytical computing initiatives (Scipy, Pandas, Numpy, NLTK, Scrapy, Pattern, sklearn, scikit-learn, Django/Flask to improve Neural Networks, Markov models, Clustering, Random Forests, K-Means, Gradient Boosting etc.)</li></ul><p>Job ID: 353283</p><p></p>
